page.title: 02Industry
page.content: In our area we have a Brick Works at Selborne.The Brick Works make bricks partly by hand.The factory is fairly small and does not produce mass bricks.The factory is quite old.It is not very central and it is not very near to any means of transportation either.Another Industrial works is the Trading Estate in Whitehill,it is quite big but is not all that busy.The Trading Estate is quite new to Whitehill and is built in a very modern style.At the back of the building the Army practice with their tanks and other Army vehicles.The estate has roughly forty factory units which store things and manufacture things.But in our area there are only twenty two factory units.The grid reference for the factory units 794 349. By Philip Cody, Chris Poole.
